--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis/Horn::
>        He replies to her message.  "Relax, I said I'm on my way and 
I'm 
> almost to your position."  He bows formally.  "I have arrived.  And 
this is 
> my dog Horn."  He pats Horn on the head.  Horn barks and starts 
panting.  "I 
> am glad to hear that you have thought some more about what I said."
